description.author: Shuji Narazaki
description.synopsis: A Minisat-based CDCL SAT solver in Haskell
description.description: A modern and very fast SAT solver written in Haskell, using CDCL, watch literals, VSIDS, blocking-literals, phase saving, LBD, Glucose-like restart and so on. 'Mios' is an abbreviation of 'Minisat-based Implementation and Optimization Study on SAT solver'.
